restart.description: Restart a container, the container must be configured in monitor_docker.

server.description: Name of the server, as given in config. Only required if you have more than one docker host config.
server.name: Server

restart.name: Restart

user.description: Setup a connection to docker host

data.name: Client name of Docker daemon
data.certpath: If a TCP socket is used, you can define your Docker certificate path, forcing Monitor Docker to enable TLS. The filenames must be cert.pem and key.pem
data.retry: Number of retries before failing connection

data.containers_exclude: Array of containers to be excluded from monitoring, when all containers are included
data.rename: Dictionary of containers to rename. Renaming is done on the name in HA Lovelace, not entity name
data.rename_entity: If rename is done, it changes also the entity name

conditions.description: Setup a connection to docker host

data.monitored_conditions: Array of conditions to be monitored
data.sensor_name: Sensor string to format the name used in Home Assistant
data.switchenabled: Enable/Disable the switch entity for containers
data.switchname: Switch string to format the name used in Home Assistant
data.buttonanabled: Enable/Disable the button entity for containers
data.buttonname: Button string to format the name used in Home Assistant
data.memorychange: Change of memory usage before alerting
data.precision_memory_mb: Precision of memory usage in MB
data.precision_memory_percentage: Precision of memory usage in percentage
data.precision_network_kb: Precision of network bandwidth in kB
data.precision_network_mb: Precision of network usage in MB
